body_html: Thanks for the comments. About to board a flight, so will address them in a bit. Just a note: the non-AVX2 code can be re-written to layout the numbers in the same order as the AVX2 version (8 at a time, interleaved). Something like https://gist.github.com/goldsborough/75ee1802110eda71517cc33ea3c59a88. Then they would be the same (on my benchmarks this "unrolled" version actually is quite a bit faster than a simple loop).

body: Thanks for the comments. About to board a flight, so will address them in a bit. Just a note: the non-AVX2 code can be re-written to layout the numbers in the same order as the AVX2 version (8 at a time, interleaved). Something like https://gist.github.com/goldsborough/75ee1802110eda71517cc33ea3c59a88. Then they would be the same (on my benchmarks this "unrolled" version actually is quite a bit faster than a simple loop).
